1. Log in to Xero.
  2. Go to [Developer portal](https://developer.xero.com/app/manage/).
  3. Click on the App you want to integrate.
  4. On the left, click on `Configuration`.
  5. Enter your `redirect url`.
  6. Copy the `Client Id` and `Client Secret`.
